name: Together (itch) (tobydo, K. Raj)
description:
A man stuck on an island decides to be abducted by a lonely alien looking for love.

Together is a two-player walking sim inspired by 90s games that only uses a keyboard! 

Grab a friend and get ready to fall in love. 

Best played on Windows. The Mac build of the game is suboptimal, with a few lighting problems.

A game by Toby Do and Krishan  Rajaratnam

Made for Tasting Room Jam: Halloween 2019

Also made at NYU for Game Studio 1 Fall 2019

Special thanks to Nina Freeman and Josh Squires for hosting the jam and to Robert Yang and Matt Boch for being great professors. :)
